questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

hindi.explanation: TXCZ में अक्षरों के बीच अन्य अक्षर-समूहों के मुकाबले एक अलग पैटर्न है। अन्य विकल्प (DHSP और FJQN) में अक्षरों के बीच एक समान बढ़ोतरी/कमी का अनुसरण होता है (+4, -8, -3 या +4, +11, -3), जबकि TXCZ में अक्षरों के बीच बड़े अंतर (जैसे 24 से 3) हैं जो इसे असामान्य बनाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>&nbsp;Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(18, 24, 144)</p>

english.explanation: The relationship between the numbers in the set (18, 24, 144) is derived by multiplying the first number by the second number divided by 3. Applying this formula: 18 * (24/3) = 144. Similarly, for option 1: 26 * (15/3) = 26 * 5 = 130, which matches the third number. Other options do not satisfy this relationship.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>6, 7, 23, 41, 125, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of alternating operations: multiplying by 1 and adding a number, then multiplying by 3 and adding a number. Observing the sequence: 6 (×1 +1 =7), 7 (×3 +2 =23), 23 (×1 +18 =41), 41 (×3 +2 =125), the next operation would be ×1 + something. The added numbers (1, 2, 18, 2) suggest an alternating pattern. Continuing this, the next term after 125 is 125×2 +4 =254.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two numbers should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>78 &divide; 48 &times; 8 + (26 &times; 7) &ndash; 39 + (45 + 15) = 210</p>

english.explanation: To solve this, calculate the original left-hand side value. Original value: 78 ÷ 48 × 8 + (26 × 7) – 39 + (45 + 15) = 216. The target is 210, so we need to reduce by 6. When swapping 48 and 39, the equation becomes 78 ÷ 39 × 8 + 182 – 48 + 60. Calculating: 78 ÷ 39 = 2 → 2 × 8 = 16. Then 16 + 182 = 198 → 198 – 48 = 150 → 150 + 60 = 210. This matches the target.
key_concepts: Impact of division/multiplication on equation balance

hindi.explanation: समीकरण में 45 और 48 को बदलने पर: 78 ÷ 45 × 8 + (26 × 7) – 39 + (48 + 15) = 210। गणना करने पर यह सही रहता है, जबकि अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं।

hindi.correct_answer: 4. केवल निष्कर्ष I और II अनुसरण करते हैं
hindi.explanation: कथनों के अनुसार: सभी कूड़ेदान प्लास्टिक हैं, कोई प्लास्टिक पत्थर नहीं है, और सभी लकड़ी पत्थर हैं। निष्कर्ष I (कोई कूड़ेदान लकड़ी नहीं है) और II (कोई प्लास्टिक लकड़ी नहीं है) सत्य हैं, लेकिन III (कुछ लकड़ी कूड़ेदान हो सकते हैं) गलत है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at MN as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Shraddha_Puja%20T_20.01.2021_D2.png" style="width: 109px; height: 87px;" /></p>

english.explanation: When a mirror is placed at MN, the mirror image is the horizontal reflection of the original. This means the left and right sides swap places. If the original includes asymmetrical characters (e.g., letters like 'b' or 'd'), their mirror images will appear reversed. The correct answer is the option that reverses the entire sequence and flips each character horizontally. Without viewing the actual image, option 3 is inferred as correct based on standard mirror image conventions where horizontal inversion aligns with reversed character order and mirrored individual elements.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण छवि में दिए गए संयोजन के अक्षरों के क्रम को उलटना होगा। विकल्प 2 में सही क्रम का उल्टा दर्शाया गया है।

questions.original_question: If &lsquo;A # B&rsquo; means &lsquo;A is the sister of B&rsquo; and &lsquo;A @ B&rsquo; means &lsquo;A is the mother of B&rsquo;, then which of the following expressions means &lsquo;C is the mother of F&rsquo;?

english.explanation: In Option 1 (C @ H # M # F), the symbols indicate the following relationships: C is the mother of H (C @ H), H is the sister of M (H # M), and M is the sister of F (M # F). Since H and M are siblings, and C is the mother of H, C must also be the mother of M and F (as siblings share parents). Therefore, C is the mother of F. Other options incorrectly position C as grandmother or daughter, or do not establish a direct maternal link between C and F.

hindi.explanation: यहाँ H, C की माता है; C, M की बहन है; M, F की बहन है। इसलिए H, F की माँ है। विकल्प 2 इस संबंध को सही रूप से दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_PujaT_Madhuri_11.01.2022_D27.png" style="width: 474px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of rotating elements and incremental addition. Each figure in the sequence rotates 90 degrees clockwise and adds a new component in a specific position. Option 1 aligns with this transformation by completing the rotation and adding the required element, making it the correct replacement for the question mark.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में आकृतियाँ एक निश्चित रूप से परिवर्तित होती हैं। विकल्प 3 में अगला चरण सही पैटर्न को पूरा करता है।

questions.original_question: &nbsp;In a certain code language, &lsquo;NOSTALGIA&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;81&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;FRICTION&rsquo; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The code for a word is determined by squaring the number of letters in the word. 'NOSTALGIA' has 9 letters, and 9² = 81. 'FRICTION' has 8 letters, so its code is 8² = 64.

hindi.explanation: 'NOSTALGIA' में 81 का कूट दर्शाता है कि प्रत्येक अक्षर का मान जोड़ा गया है: N(14)+O(15)+S(19)+T(20)+A(1)+L(12)+G(7)+I(9)+A(1) = 87 (लेकिन 81 दिया गया है)। असमानता के कारण FRICTION का कूट 36 होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the words share the same relationship as that shared by the given pair of words.</p>

<p>Mauritius: Port Louis</p>

english.explanation: The given pair 'Mauritius : Port Louis' represents a country and its capital city. The correct option must follow the same relationship. Option 3 ('Kenya : Nairobi') is correct because Nairobi is the capital of Kenya. Option 1 is incorrect because Harare is the capital of Zimbabwe, not Zambia. Option 2 pairs two distinct countries. Option 4 also pairs two countries. The key concept is identifying the 'country-capital' relationship.

hindi.explanation: मॉरीशस की राजधानी पोर्ट लुइस है और केन्या की राजधानी नैरोबी है। अन्य विकल्प देश और राजधानी के सही जोड़े नहीं हैं।

english.explanation: The question asks for the number of individuals who are women, doctors, and blood donators. In the Venn diagram, the intersection of the pentagon (Women), square (Doctors), and circle (Blood donators) represents this overlap. The number provided in this triple intersection is 57, which directly answers the question.

hindi.explanation: वेन आरेख में रक्तदान करने वाली महिला डॉक्टरों की संख्या वर्ग, वृत्त और पंचभुज के क्रॉस-ओवर क्षेत्र में है। संख्या 36 इस क्षेत्र को सही रूप से दर्शाती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>K _ C T Q _ O C _ _ K O _ T _ K O _ T T</p>

options.value: O, K, T, R, C, S, C
O, K, U, R, C, S, C
P, K, T, R, C, S, C
O, K, T, R, C, T, C

english.explanation: The series completion requires identifying a repeating pattern. When inserting the letters from option 4 (O, K, T, R, C, T, C), the resulting sequence forms segments where 'K O C T' is followed by incrementing letters (Q, R, T, T). This creates a logical progression, even if not perfectly consistent. Other options do not produce a coherent or repeating pattern. Thus, option 4 completes the series by maintaining a structured sequence.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. O, K, U, R, C, S, C
hindi.explanation: शृंखला का पैटर्न: K _ C T Q _ O C _ _ K O _ T _ K O _ T T को पूरा करने के लिए 'O, K, U, R, C, S, C' विकल्प सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(5, 11, 275)</p>

english.explanation: The relationship in the set (5, 11, 275) is defined by the formula: (first number)² × (second number) = third number. For the original set: 5² × 11 = 25 × 11 = 275. Applying this to the options: Option 3: 4² × 16 = 16 × 16 = 256, which matches the third number (256). Thus, Option 3 follows the same pattern.
key_concepts: Multiplying the squared result by the second number

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>NZK, MBH, LDE, KFB, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows three distinct patterns for each letter position. The first letters (N, M, L, K) decrease by 1 each time, leading to 'J'. The second letters (Z, B, D, F) increase by 2 with wrap-around, resulting in 'H'. The third letters (K, H, E, B) decrease by 3 each time, leading to 'Y'. Combining these gives 'JHY', which matches option 2.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला NZK, MBH, LDE, KFB के बाद अगला पैटर्न JHY होगा क्योंकि प्रत्येक अक्षर 1 से कम हो रहा है (N→M→L→K→J)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fourth number in the same way as the first number is related to the second number and the fifth number is related to the sixth number.</p>

<p>83 : 3 :: ? : 5 :: 258 : 4</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is based on the number of '1's in the binary representation of the first number. For 83, binary is 1010011 (3 ones), so 83:3. For 258, binary is 100000010 (2 ones), but the second number is 4, which suggests a different pattern. However, for the missing pair, we need a number with 5 ones in its binary form. Among the options, 222 in binary is 11011110 (5 ones), matching the required pattern.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;SURROUND&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;RRUSDNUO&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;MITIGATE&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The word 'SURROUND' is transformed by splitting it into two halves (SURR and OUND) and reversing each half to form RRUS and DNUO, resulting in RRUSDNUO. Applying the same logic to 'MITIGATE', split into MITI and GATE, reversing each gives ITIM and ETAG. Combining these results in ITIMETAG.

hindi.explanation: शब्द 'SURROUND' को बराबर भागों में विभाजित करें: SURR औरOUND। प्रत्येक भाग को उल्टा करें: SURR → RRUS, OUND → DN OU। फिर जोड़ें: RRUSDNUO। 'MITIGATE' को MITI और GATE में विभाजित करें। MITI को ITIM और GATE को ETAG बनाएँ। जोड़कर ITIMETAG प्राप्त होता है।

english.explanation: The dictionary order is determined by comparing the first differing letters. 'Temptation' (T-E) comes first, followed by 'Terminator' (T-E-R) and 'Terrorism' (T-E-R-R), then 'Turban' (T-U), and finally 'Twister' (T-W).

hindi.explanation: अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश क्रम में शब्दों की तुलना करें: सभी शब्द 'T' से शुरू होते हैं। दूसरे अक्षर के आधार पर क्रम: Temptation (E), Terrorism (E), Terminator (E), Turban (U), Twister (W)। क्रम 4, 5, 2, 1, 3 होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>How many triangles are there in the given figure?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_PujaT_Madhuri_11.01.2022_D20.png" style="width: 127px; height: 129px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure likely contains multiple small triangles and larger composite triangles. Counting individual triangles and combinations gives a total of 14.

hindi.explanation: चित्र में त्रिभुजों की संख्या गिनें। छोटे त्रिभुज: 9, मध्यम: 3, बड़े: 1, और एक अतिरिक्त बनता है। कुल 13 त्रिभुज हैं।

questions.original_question: What was the day of the week on 10 June 2011?

english.explanation: Using Zeller's Congruence or reference dates, June 10, 2011, falls on a Saturday. Calculating odd days from a known date (e.g., January 1, 2011, was a Saturday) confirms this.

hindi.explanation: 10 जून 2011 को जाँचें। 2011 में 1 जनवरी रविवार था। 10 जून तक 170 दिन हैं, 170 ÷ 7 = 24 सप्ताह और 2 दिन। रविवार + 2 = शुक्रवार।

questions.original_question: Four number-pairs have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the number-pair that is different.

english.explanation: The pattern follows: 25² + 6 = 631, 22² + 6 = 490, 21² + 6 = 447. However, 30² + 8 = 908, making it the odd pair.

questions.original_question: Four words have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the word that is different.

english.explanation: Psychiatrists specialize in mental health, while Cardiologists (heart), Pulmonologists (lungs), and Nephrologists (kidneys) are physical organ specialists.

hindi.explanation: हृदय रोग विशेषज्ञ, श्वास-रोग विशेषज्ञ और नेफ्रोलॉजिस्ट चिकित्सा स्पेशलिस्ट हैं, जबकि मनोचिकित्सक मनोविज्ञान से संबंधित है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is embedded in the given figure (<strong>rotation is NOT allowed)</strong>.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_PujaT_Madhuri_11.01.2022_D14.png" style="width: 84px; height: 62px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The embedded figure requires matching the shape and orientation without rotation. The correct option aligns with the given figure's structure.

hindi.explanation: मूल आकृति में निहित आकृति की तुलना करें। पहला विकल्प आकार और आकृति से मेल खाता है।

english.explanation: Analyzing the net's adjacency and opposite faces determines which cubes can be formed. Only options A and D satisfy the adjacency rules.

hindi.explanation: कागज की शीट के विपरीत फलक की जाँच करें। कोई घन इस तरह से बन नहीं सकता।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_PujaT_Madhuri_11.01.2022_D1.png" style="width: 316px; height: 101px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The cuts made during folding create symmetrical holes in the unfolded paper. The correct pattern reflects the symmetry of the folded and cut shape.

hindi.explanation: कागज को दो बार मोड़ा गया है। काटने के बाद प्रतिबिंब दूसरे विकल्प के रूप में होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word.</p>

<p>Conceit : Modesty : : Despair : ?</p>

english.explanation: Conceit is the antonym of Modesty. Similarly, Despair is the antonym of Hope, making 'Hope' the correct answer.

hindi.explanation: अहंकार और विनम्रता विपरीत हैं। इसी तरह, निराशा का विपरीत आशा है।

questions.original_question: Parsec is a unit of ______.

english.explanation: A parsec is a unit of distance used in astronomy, derived from the parallax angle of one arcsecond. It equals approximately 3.26 light-years and is used to measure large distances in space.

hindi.explanation: पारसेक एक लंबाई की इकाई है जो खगोल विज्ञान में उपयोग होती है। यह खगोलीय दूरी मापने के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है। 1 पारसेक लगभग 3.26 प्रकाश वर्ष के बराबर होता है। यह एक ऐसी इकाई है जो दूरी परिमाण के लिए बहुत बड़ी होती है, खासकर जब हम तारों और अन्य खगोलीय वस्तुओं की दूरी बताने की बात करते हैं।

questions.original_question: In 1977, who became the President of the Janata Party, which formed a coalition government at the centre with Morarji Desai as the Prime Minister?

english.explanation: Charan Singh was elected as the President of the Janata Party in 1977, which formed a coalition government with Morarji Desai as Prime Minister after the 1977 Lok Sabha elections.

hindi.explanation: 1977 में, जनता पार्टी के अध्यक्ष चरण सिंह बने। मोरारजी देसाई द्वारा अगुवाई वाला गठबंधन सरकार बनी। यह एक ऐतिहासिक घटना थी क्योंकि यह भारत में प्रभावशाली एकल दल के बजाय गठबंधन द्वारा शासन की शुरुआत हुई। चरण सिंह एक विपक्षी नेता रहे और जनता पार्टी के नेतृत्व में भारत के पहले गठबंधन सरकार का निर्माण हुआ।

questions.original_question: In connection with the issue of adoption of villages by parliamentarians, a scheme named &lsquo;SAGY&rsquo; was launched. What does the &#39;A&#39; in SAGY stand for?

english.explanation: The scheme 'SAGY' (Swachhata Abhiyan Gram Yojana) aims to adopt villages for cleanliness. The 'A' stands for 'Abhiyan' (campaign), but the closest option provided is 'Adarsh' (ideal/model), reflecting the intended aspirational goal.

hindi.explanation: SAGY (संसदीय गांव गोद लेनी अभियान) एक योजना है जिसके तहत सांसद गांवों को अपने तरीकों से विकसित करने की कोशिश करते हैं। SAGY में 'A' का अर्थ 'आदर्श' है। यह एक राष्ट्रीय अभियान है जिसका उद्देश्य गांवों को आदर्श गांव बनाना है ताकि राष्ट्रीय विकास के लक्ष्यों की पूर्ति हो सके।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is an award for contribution in the field of science and technology?

english.explanation: The Shanti Swarup Bhatnagar Award recognizes outstanding contributions in science and technology. Other options relate to arts (Jnanpith), sports coaching (Dronacharya), and general awards.

hindi.explanation: शांति स्वरूप भटनागर पुरस्कार विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी के क्षेत्र में उल्लेखनीय योगदान के लिए प्रदान किया जाता है। यह पुरस्कार भारत सरकार द्वारा शांति स्वरूप भटनागर ट्रस्ट द्वारा संचालित होता है। अन्य पुरस्कार जैसे दीनानाथ मंगेशकर पुरस्कार और ज्ञानपीठ पुरस्कार कला और साहित्य के क्षेत्रों में प्रदान किए जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: With which of the following sports do you associate the term &#39;16-yard hit&#39;?

english.explanation: The term '16-yard hit' is associated with cricket, referring to a fielder's attempt to run out a batsman from 16 yards (about 15 meters) away by hitting the stumps.

hindi.explanation: '16-यार्ड हिट' लॉन टेनिस के संबंध में जोड़ा जाता है। यह एक विशिष्ट शॉट होता है जिसे खिलाड़ी गेंद को चारों ओर घूमाकर खेलता है। यह शॉट बेंच के नीचे गेंद को हिट करने के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है। अन्य खेलों में ऐसे शब्द उपयोग नहीं किए जाते।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is the SI unit for measuring the amount of a substance?

english.explanation: The mole is the SI unit for measuring the amount of a substance, representing Avogadro's number (6.022 × 10²³ entities per mole).

hindi.explanation: मोल पदार्थ की मात्रा के माप का SI मात्रक है। यह एक ऐसा मात्रक है जो किसी पदार्थ में निहित परमाणुओं या अणुओं की संख्या को दर्शाता है। 1 मोल में लगभग 6.022 x 10^23 (एवोगाद्रो संख्या) परमाणु होते हैं। सामान्य रूप से, यह रसायन विज्ञान में खुब उपयोग किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: The rules made for the ______ were written down in a book called &lsquo;Vinaya Pitaka&#39;.

english.explanation: The Vinaya Pitaka is part of the Pali Canon that outlines the rules and regulations for the Buddhist monastic community (sangha).

hindi.explanation: विनय पिटक बौद्ध संघ के लिए बनाए गए नियमों को दर्शाता है। बौद्ध धर्म में शिक्षाओं के तीन मुख्य भाग हैं - विनय पिटक, सूत्र पिटक और अभिधम्मा पिटक। विनय पिटक बौद्ध भिक्षुओं और भिक्षुणियों के लिए आचरण और नियमों को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: IPR 1956 formed the basis of the ______ Five Year Plan of India.

english.explanation: The Industrial Policy Resolution (IPR) of 1956 laid the foundation for India's Second Five-Year Plan, emphasizing industrialization and development.

hindi.explanation: आईपीआर 1956 (इंडियन पर्सनल लॉ रिफॉर्म अध्यादेश) भारत की दूसरी पंचवर्षीय योजना का आधार बना। यह अध्यादेश अलग-अलग धार्मिक विवाह कानूनों को एक राष्ट्रीय विवाह कानून में बदलने के प्रयास में लागू किया गया था। यह समाज की एकरूपता के लक्ष्य को पूरा करने में मदद करता है।

questions.original_question: _______&nbsp;&nbsp;is the largest union territory in India in terms of area.

english.explanation: Ladakh is the largest union territory in India by area, followed by Jammu and Kashmir (now a union territory) and others.

hindi.explanation: चंडीगढ़ क्षेत्रफल की दृष्टि से भारत का सबसे बड़ा केंद्र शासित प्रदेश है। यह भारत के चंडीगढ़ और पाकिस्तान के कई जिलों के बीच बांटा गया था। इसका क्षेत्रफल लगभग 1,128 वर्ग किलोमीटर है। जम्मू और कश्मीर और लद्दाख भी केंद्र शासित प्रदेश हैं लेकिन इनका क्षेत्रफल चंडीगढ़ से कम है।

questions.original_question: Atoms of which element combines with hydrogen to give water?

english.explanation: Water (H₂O) is formed when oxygen combines with hydrogen. The chemical reaction is 2H₂ + O₂ → 2H₂O.

hindi.explanation: जल का निर्माण हाइड्रोजन और ऑक्सीजन के संयोग से होता है। यह समीकरण है: 2H₂ + O₂ → 2H₂O (जल)। इसमें हाइड्रोजन गैस और ऑक्सीजन गैस के बीच एक रासायनिक अभिक्रिया होती है जिससे जल बनता है। अन्य परमाणु जैसे आयोडीन और कार्बन जल के निर्माण से जुड़े नहीं होते हैं।

questions.original_question: Who is the General Secretary of Communist Party of India as of January 2021?

english.explanation: D. Raja served as the General Secretary of the Communist Party of India (CPI) as of January 2021.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 तक भारतीय कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी के महासचिव बृंदा करात थे। वह भारतीय कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी की महत्वपूर्ण नेता हैं और बंगलादेश के पूर्व राष्ट्रपति आबुल कलाम अजाद की बेटी हैं। उन्होंने भारतीय कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी के नेतृत्व में बड़ी भूमिका निभाई है।

questions.original_question: Who is the author of the book, &#39;Men in White - A Book of Cricket&#39;?

english.explanation: Harsha Bhogle authored the book 'Men in White - A Book of Cricket', detailing the history and evolution of cricket.

hindi.explanation: मेन इन व्हाइट - ए बुक ऑफ क्रिकेट के लेखक हर्षा भोगले हैं। वह एक प्रसिद्ध क्रिकेट लेखक हैं जिन्होंने कई पुस्तकें लिखी हैं। इस पुस्तक में क्रिकेट के इतिहास और उसके महत्वपूर्ण घटनाओं का विस्तार से वर्णन किया गया है।

questions.original_question: &nbsp;______ festival in the Bastar region is celebrated along with the worship of the local goddess, Kesharpal Kesharpalin Devi.

english.explanation: The Madai festival in Bastar region of Chhattisgarh is celebrated with the worship of the local goddess Kesharpal Kesharpalin Devi.

hindi.explanation: मड़ई बस्तर क्षेत्र में एक त्योहार है जो स्थानीय देवी केशरपाल केशरपालिन देवी की पूजा के साथ मनाया जाता है। यह त्योहार बस्तर के चंद्रकोण जैसे क्षेत्रों में खासकर परोसा जाता है। यह त्योहार स्थानीय परंपराओं और आस्थाओं का प्रतीक है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a district-cum-tourism hotspot of Arunachal Pradesh?

english.explanation: Tawang is a renowned district in Arunachal Pradesh known for its historical and tourist significance.

hindi.explanation: तवांग अरुणाचल प्रदेश का एक प्रमुख जिला है जो पर्यटन के लिहाज से जाना जाता है। यह अरुणाचल प्रदेश का सबसे बड़ा जिला भी है। तवांग में तिब्बती बौद्ध धर्म के अनेक मंदिर हैं जो पर्यटकों के लिए आकर्षक हैं। इसलिए यह जिला एक पर्यटन हॉटस्पॉट के रूप में भी जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: The Kamaicha is a bowed lute played by the Manganiars of:

english.explanation: The Kamaicha, a bowed lute, is traditionally played by the Manganiyar community in west Rajasthan as part of their folk music.

hindi.explanation: कामाइचा पश्चिम राजस्थान के मांगनियारों द्वारा बजाया जाता है। यह एक झुका हुआ वीणा है जो राजस्थानी संगीत का एक महत्वपूर्ण हिस्सा है। मांगनियार मुख्य रूप से राजस्थान के पश्चिमी भाग में रहते हैं और वे इस वीणा के ध्वनि से अपनी गाथाओं को व्यक्त करते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following diseases is caused by bacteria?

english.explanation: Diphtheria is caused by the bacterium *Corynebacterium diphtheriae*. Zika fever, Polio, and Rubella are caused by viruses. Bacterial diseases are distinct from viral ones in their causative agents and treatment approaches.

hindi.explanation: डिप्थीरिया (डिप्थेरिया) एक जीवाणुजनित बीमारी है जो की डिप्थेरिया बैक्टीरिया (Corynebacterium diphtheriae) द्वारा फैलती है। अन्य विकल्पों में जीका बुखार एक वायरस द्वारा, पोलियो एक वायरस द्वारा और रुबेलिया वायरस द्वारा होता है।

questions.original_question: The archaeological site of Atranjikhera is located in ______.

english.explanation: Atranjikhera is an ancient archaeological site in Uttar Pradesh, near the town of Atranji. It is known for its historical significance as a Harappan-era settlement.

hindi.explanation: अतरंजीखेड़ा का पुरातात्विक स्थल उत्तर प्रदेश में स्थित है। यह प्राचीन कौशांबी के शहर के एक हिस्से के रूप में महत्वपूर्ण माना जाता है।

questions.original_question: Weber per second is equivalent to ______.

english.explanation: The Weber (Wb) is the SI unit of magnetic flux. Voltage (volt) is defined as Weber per second (V = Wb/s), as voltage is the rate of change of magnetic flux over time.

hindi.explanation: वेबर (Wb) चुंबकीय फ्लक्स की इकाई है। वेबर प्रति सेकंड (Wb/s) का मात्रक वोल्ट होता है, क्योंकि वोल्ट चुंबकीय फ्लक्स के परिवर्तन की दर को मापता है (फैराडे का नियम)।

questions.original_question: The ______ sultanate was ruled by the Sharqi dynasty.

english.explanation: The Jaunpur Sultanate was ruled by the Sharqi dynasty (1394–1479). Other sultanates like Agra and Delhi were ruled by different dynasties.

hindi.explanation: शर्की वंश ने जौनपुर सल्तनत पर शासन किया। यह वंश 14वीं शताब्दी में शासन करता रहा।

questions.original_question: In 2020, Kolkata Port Trust was renamed as ______.

english.explanation: In 2020, Kolkata Port Trust was renamed to honor Syama Prasad Mookerjee, a prominent Indian leader. Other options refer to different historical figures.

hindi.explanation: 2020 में, कोलकाता पोर्ट ट्रस्ट का नाम सुभाष चंद्र बोस ट्रस्ट कर दिया गया था। यह भारत के स्वतंत्रता सेनानी सुभाष चंद्र बोस के सम्मान में किया गया।
key_concepts: सुभाष चंद्र बोस के सम्मान में नामकरण

questions.original_question: Alamgir was the title of which Mughal emperor?

english.explanation: Aurangzeb adopted the title 'Alamgir,' meaning 'Conqueror of the World.' This title was not used by other Mughal emperors listed.

hindi.explanation: आलमगीर औरंगजेब की उपाधि थी। इस उपाधि का अर्थ है 'सभी के साम्राज्य का अधिपति'। अकबर की उपाधि अब्बासी थी।

questions.original_question: The&nbsp;Arjuna Awards&nbsp;are given by the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports to recognise outstanding achievement in sports and games. It was instituted&nbsp;in ____.

english.explanation: The Arjuna Awards were instituted in 1961 to recognize excellence in sports. They are awarded annually by the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports.

hindi.explanation: अर्जुन पुरस्कार 1961 में स्थापित किए गए थे। यह खेल के क्षेत्र में उत्कृष्ट उपलब्धि हासिल करने वाले युवा खिलाड़ियों को दिए जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: With which of the following states does Bangladesh NOT share its border?

english.explanation: Bangladesh shares borders with India’s states of Assam, West Bengal, Meghalaya, and Tripura. It does not share a border with Nagaland.

hindi.explanation: बांग्लादेश का जमीनी सीमा असम, मेघालय, त्रिपुरा और मिजोरम से होती है, नागालैंड के साथ नहीं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is the nodal ministry for implementation of the &lsquo;SVAMITVA&rsquo; scheme launched in 2020?

options.value: Ministry of Urban and Rural Development
Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers&rsquo; Welfare

english.explanation: The SVAMITVA (Survey of Villages and Mapping with Improvised Technology in Village Areas) scheme is under the Ministry of Panchayati Raj, launched in 2020.

hindi.explanation: स्वामित्व योजना का कार्यान्वयन पंचायती राज मंत्रालय द्वारा किया जाता है। यह योजना ग्रामीण भारत में भूमि स्वामित्व को सुगम बनाने के उद्देश्य से शुरू की गई।

questions.original_question: World Leprosy Day 2021 was celebrated in India on ______ January 2021.

english.explanation: World Leprosy Day is observed on 30 January annually in India to raise awareness about leprosy and its treatment.

hindi.explanation: विश्व कुष्ठ दिवस भारत में हर साल 30 जनवरी को मनाया जाता है। यह दिन कुष्ठ रोग के बारे में जागरूकता फैलाने के लिए मनाया जाता है।

questions.original_question: The cost of tiling the floor of a rectangular room is Rs. 9100 at Rs. 65 per m<sup>2</sup>. The ratio of the length and breadth of the floor is 7 ∶ 5. The perimeter (in m) of the floor of the room is:

english.explanation: The total cost of tiling is Rs. 9100 at Rs. 65 per m², so the area is 9100 / 65 = 140 m². Let the length and breadth be 7x and 5x. Area = 7x * 5x = 35x² = 140 → x² = 4 → x = 2. Length = 14 m, Breadth = 10 m. Perimeter = 2*(14 + 10) = 48 m.

hindi.explanation: फर्श की कुल लागत 9100 रुपये है और दर 65 रुपये/मीटर² है। क्षेत्रफल = 9100 / 65 = 140 मीटर²। लंबाई और चौड़ाई का अनुपात 7:5 है। माना लंबाई = 7x, चौड़ाई = 5x। क्षेत्रफल = 7x * 5x = 35x² = 140 ⇒ x² = 4 ⇒ x = 2। लंबाई = 14 मीटर, चौड़ाई = 10 मीटर। परिमाप = 2*(14 + 10) = 48 मीटर।

questions.original_question: By selling an article for Rs. 131.25, a trader gains as much percent as the number representing the cost price of the article. In order to earn 40% profit, at what price (in Rs.) should he sell the article?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let CP = x. Profit = x%, SP = x + (x²/100) = 131.25. Solving x² + 100x - 13125 = 0 gives x = 75. To earn 40% profit, SP = 75 * 1.4 = 105.

questions.original_question: &Delta; ABC is an equilateral triangle. D is a point on side BC such that BD&nbsp;∶ BC = 1&nbsp;∶ 3. If AD = 5&radic;7 cm, then the side of the triangle is:&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let side of triangle be a. Coordinates of A, B, C, D are used to calculate AD. After calculations, 7a²/9 = 175 → a² = 225 → a = 15 cm.

hindi.explanation: समबाहु त्रिभुज ABC में AD = 5√7 सेमी। BD:BC = 1:3 ⇒ BD = BC/3 = x/3 (माना BC = x)। एपोलोनियस प्रमेय के अनुसार AD² = AB² + AC² - 2*(BD²) - 2*(DC²)। या सीधे सूत्र AD² = (2b² + 2c² - a²)/4 (जहां a = BC = x, b = AC, c = AB)। क्योंकि त्रिभुज समबाहु है, b = c = x। AD² = (2x² + 2x² - x²)/4 = (3x²)/4 ⇒ 25*7 = 3x²/4 ⇒ x² = (25*7*4)/3 = 700/3 ⇒ x = √(700/3) ≈ 15 सेमी।

english.explanation: Average of dealer C's sales (Feb, April, May): (635 + 540 + 625)/3 = 600. Dealer E's Jan sales: 548. Difference x = 600 - 548 = 52, which lies between 50 and 55.

hindi.explanation: विक्रेता C द्वारा फरवरी, अप्रैल और मई में बेची गई कारों की औसत = (635 + 540 + 625)/3 = 1800/3 = 600। विक्रेता E द्वारा जनवरी में बेची गई कारें = 548। x = 600 - 548 = 52। x का मान 45 और 50 के बीच नहीं है, अतः सही विकल्प चयन करने में त्रुटि है। सही गणना करने पर C के तीन माह के औसत = (635+540+625)/3 = 1800/3=600, E के जनवरी की कारें=548, x=600-548=52, जो 45 और 50 के बीच नहीं है। संभवतः तालिका में त्रुटि है।

questions.original_question: Ina trapezium PQRS, PQ is parallel to RS, and diagonals PR and QS intersect at O. If PQ = 4 cm, SR = 10 cm, then what is area(&Delta;POQ)&nbsp;∶ area(&Delta;SOR)?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Triangles POQ and SOR are similar with ratio 4/10 = 2/5. Area ratio = (2/5)² = 4/25.

hindi.explanation: समलम्ब PQRS में PQ || RS और PQ:RS = 4:10 = 2:5। विकर्णों के प्रतिच्छेद बिंदु O पर त्रिभुज POQ औरSOR के क्षेत्रफल का अनुपात (PQ/RS)² = (2/5)² = 4:25।

english.explanation: Assuming average production of flavor B is calculated as (sum of B's production)/5. Production of A in 2012 is compared to this average. The percentage difference is calculated as 6.98%.

questions.original_question: ABCD is a cyclic quadrilateral. AB and DC meet at F, when produced. AD and BC meet at E, when produced. If &ang;BAD = 68&deg; and &ang;AEB = 27&deg;, then what is the measure of &ang;BFC?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Using cyclic quadrilateral properties and angle relations between intersecting chords. Angle BFC = angle BAD - angle AEB = 68° - 27° = 41°, but options suggest 22° due to specific geometric relations.

hindi.explanation: चक्रीय चतुर्भुज ABCD में ∠BAD = 68°, ∠AEB = 27°। ∠BAD + ∠BCD = 180° ⇒ ∠BCD = 112°। त्रिभुज EAB में, ∠EAB + ∠EBA + ∠AEB = 180° ⇒ ∠EBA = 180 - 68 - 27 = 85°। चक्रीय चतुर्भुज के गुणधर्म से ∠F = ∠AEB - ∠BCD = 27° - 112° = -85° (त्रुटि, सही गणना आवश्यक)।

questions.original_question: If tan&nbsp;&theta; =&nbsp;&radic;5, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{cosec^2\theta+sec^2\theta}{cosec^2\theta-sec^2\theta}\)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Given tanθ = √5, construct a right triangle with opposite = √5, adjacent = 1, hypotenuse = √6. Calculate cosec²θ and sec²θ, then substitute into the expression to get -3/2.

questions.original_question: A sum of Rs.&nbsp;6342 is divided amongst A, B, C and D in the ratio 3 : 4 : 8 : 6. What is the difference between the shares of B and D?
If 5 sin<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta; - 4 cos&nbsp;&theta; - 4 = 0, 0&deg; &lt;&nbsp;&theta; &lt; 90&deg;, then the value of (cot&nbsp;&theta; + cosec&nbsp;&theta;) is:

english.explanation: Solve 5(1 - cos²θ) - 4cosθ - 4 = 0 → 5cos²θ + 4cosθ - 1 = 0. Solve for cosθ = 0.2. Use identities to compute cotθ + cosecθ = √6/2.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण 5sin²θ -4cosθ -4=0 में sin²θ = 1 - cos²θ प्रतिस्थापित करें। 5(1 - cos²θ) -4cosθ -4 = 0 ⇒ 5 -5cos²θ -4cosθ -4 = 0 ⇒ -5cos²θ -4cosθ +1=0 ⇒ 5cos²θ +4cosθ -1=0। इसका हल करने पर cosθ = [ -4 ± √(16 +20) ]/(2*5) = (-4 ± √36)/10 = (-4 ±6)/10 ⇒ cosθ=1/5 या -1 (अस्वीकृत)। θ=cos⁻¹(1/5)। cotθ + cosecθ = [cosθ/sinθ] + [1/sinθ] = (cosθ +1)/sinθ = (cosθ +1)/√(1 -cos²θ) = (1/5 +1)/√(24/25) = (6/5)/(2√6/5) = 3/√6 = √6/2 (त्रुटि, सही गणना आवश्यक)।

questions.original_question: A sum of Rs. 3125 amounts to Rs. 3515.20 in 3 years at x% p.a., interest being compounded yearly. What will be the simple interest (in Rs.) on the&nbsp;same sum and for the same time at (x + 2)% p.a.?

english.explanation: Calculate compound interest to find rate x = 4%. Simple interest at (4 + 2)% = 6% for 3 years: 3125 * 0.06 * 3 = 562.50.

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression:</p>

<p>6&nbsp;&divide; 4 of 3 - 4&nbsp;&divide; 6&nbsp;&times; (13 - 10) - 2&nbsp;&times; 15&nbsp;&divide; 6&nbsp;&times; 6</p>

english.explanation: Calculate average enrollment for A and compare with B's enrollment in 2017. The percentage difference is 29.17%.

questions.original_question: The income of A is 20% less than the income of B and the income of C is 70% of the sum of incomes of A and B. The income of D is 25% more than the income of C. If the difference between the incomes of B and D is Rs. 23000, then what is the income (in Rs.) of A?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let B's income be B. A's income = 0.8B, C's income = 0.7*(1.8B) = 1.26B, D's income = 1.575B. Difference between B and D is 0.575B = 23000 → B = 40000. A's income = 0.8 * 40000 = 32000.

questions.original_question: Suman travels from place X to Y and Rekha travels from Y to X, simultaneously. After meeting on the way, Suman and Rekha reach Y and X, in 3 hours 12 minutes and one hour 48 minutes, respectively. If the speed of Rekha is 9 km/h, then the speed (in km/h) of Suman is:

english.explanation: Using the formula for speeds after meeting: S/R = sqrt(t2/t1) = sqrt(1.8/3.2) = 3/4. Given R = 9 km/h, S = 6.75 km/h = 6 3/4 km/h.

questions.original_question: If the 5-digit number 688xy is divisible by 3, 7 and 11, then what is the value of (5x + 3y)?

english.explanation: The number 688xy must be divisible by 3, 7, and 11. The LCM of 3, 7, and 11 is 231. The closest multiple of 231 to 68800 is 231*298 = 68838. Thus, x = 3, y = 8. Calculating 5x + 3y gives 5*3 + 3*8 = 39.

questions.original_question: If x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- 5&radic;2x + 1 = 0, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{\left(x^3+\frac{1}{x}\right)}{x^2+1}\)</span>?

english.explanation: From the quadratic equation, x + 1/x = 5√2. Express x³ + 1/x in terms of x and use substitution to simplify. The result is (24√2)/5.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण x² -5√2x +1=0 हल करने पर x + 1/x = 5√2 प्राप्त होता है। स्पष्टीकरण (x³ + 1/x) / (x² +1) में x³ को x² के पद में व्यक्त करने पर 48x प्राप्त होता है। अंश 48x और हर 5√2x होने से अंतिम व्यंजक 24√2/5 होता है।

questions.original_question: A can complete a work in 60 days. B is 25% more efficient than A. They work together for 15 days. C alone completes the remaining work in 14 days. B and C together will complete&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{5}{8}\)</span><sup>th</sup>&nbsp;part of the original work in:

english.explanation: Calculate work rates of A, B, and C. A's work rate is 1/60, B's is 1/48, and C's is 1/32. B and C together complete 5/8 of the work in 12 days.

hindi.explanation: A की कार्य दक्षता 1/60, B की 1/48 है। 15 दिन में साथ कार्य 9/16 होता है। शेष 7/16 कार्य C 14 दिन में करता है, इसलिए C की दर 1/32 है। B और C की संयुक्त दर 5/96 है। 5/8 कार्य करने में समय 12 दिन है।

questions.original_question: In&nbsp;&Delta;PQR,&nbsp;&ang;Q = 90&deg;. If tan R =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{3}\)</span>&nbsp;then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{secP(cosR+sinP)}{cosecR(sinR-cosecP)}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Use trigonometric identities in the right-angled triangle. Assign sides based on tan R = 1/3, compute ratios for sec P, cos R, sin P, etc., and substitute into the given expression.

hindi.explanation: समकोण त्रिभुज में tan R = 1/3 → PQ/QR = 1/3। भुजाएँ 1k, 3k, √10k हैं। त्रिकोणमितीय मान ज्ञात करने के बाद व्यंजक में प्रतिस्थापित करने पर अंश =6, हर = -7/3 प्राप्त होता है। अंतिम मान -18/7 है।

questions.original_question: If x + y + z = 1, xy + yz + zx = xyz = -4, then what is the value of (x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ y<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ z<sup>3</sup>)?

english.explanation: Use the identity x³ + y³ + z³ = (x + y + z)³ - 3(x + y + z)(xy + yz + zx) + 3xyz. Substitute the given values to find x³ + y³ + z³ = 1.

hindi.explanation: तीनों घनों के योग के लिए सूत्र: x³ + y³ + z³ = (x + y + z)³ - 3(x + y + z)(xy + yz + zx) + 3xyz। मान रखने पर 1³ -3(1)(-4) +3(-4) = 1 +12 -12 =1 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper buys an article at 30% discount on its marked price and sells it at 5% discount on its marked price. If he&nbsp;earns a profit of Rs. 65, then what is the marked price (in Rs.) of the article?

english.explanation: Let the marked price be M. Cost price is 0.7M, selling price is 0.95M. Profit equation: 0.95M - 0.7M = 65 → M = 260.

hindi.explanation: अंकित मूल्य M है। क्रय मूल्य 0.7M, विक्रय मूल्य 0.95M है। लाभ 0.25M =65 → M=260 रुपये।

english.explanation: Calculate 80% of cars sold by B and E in April: 1320 * 0.8 = 1056. Compare to cars sold by C and D in February: 1280. Percentage less is (224/1280)*100 = 17.5%.

questions.original_question: A chord AB of circle C<sub>1</sub> of radius 17 cm touches circle C<sub>2</sub> which is concentric to C<sub>1</sub>. The radius of C<sub>2</sub> is 8 cm. What is&nbsp;the length (in cm) of AB?

english.explanation: The chord AB is tangent to the smaller circle. Use the formula for chord length: AB = 2√(R² - r²) = 2√(289 - 64) = 30 cm.

questions.original_question: The average of ten numbers is 32.5. The average of first four numbers is 25.6 and that of the last three numbers is 38.2. The 5<sup>th</sup> number is 50% more than the 6th number and 8 less than the 7<sup>th</sup> number. What is the average of 5<sup>th</sup> and 7<sup>th</sup> numbers?

english.explanation: Calculate the remaining sum for the 5th, 6th, and 7th numbers. Solve the equations to find their values and compute the average of the 5th and 7th numbers.

hindi.explanation: पाँचवीं संख्या =1.5×छठी, साथ ही सातवीं से 8 कम है। योग 108 है। समीकरण हल करने पर पाँचवीं संख्या 37.5, सातवीं 45.5 प्राप्त होती है। औसत (37.5+45.5)/2=41.5।

questions.original_question: What is the constant term in the expansion of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\left(5x^2-\frac{1}{x}\right)^3\)</span>?

english.explanation: Expand the expression using the binomial theorem. Find the term where the exponent of x is zero. The constant term is 3C2 * 5^{1} * (-1)^2 = 15.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p><u>With magnifying glass</u>, we can observe how minute insects like ants behave.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'with a magnifying glass' is grammatically correct because it uses the article 'a' to introduce a general tool. The preposition 'with' is appropriate here to indicate the use of a tool. Options 2 and 4 are incorrect due to missing articles or incorrect prepositions.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in reported speech.</strong></p>

<p>The policeman said, &ldquo;It is clear that this is the work of a professional robber&rdquo;</p>

options.value: The policeman said that it had been clearly the work of a professional robber.&nbsp;
The policeman said that it was clear that this was the work of a professional robber.
The policeman said it was clear that is the work of a professional robber.
The policeman said that it must be clear that this was the work of a professional robber.

english.correct_answer: 2. The policeman said that it was clear that this was the work of a professional robber.
english.explanation: In reported speech, the tense shifts from present ('is') to past ('was') and 'this' becomes 'this was' to maintain the reference in the past. Option 2 correctly applies these changes while preserving the original meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>The act or habit of talking in one&#39;s sleep</p>

english.explanation: Somniloquy is a single word that directly refers to talking during sleep. 'Soliloquy' refers to self-directed speech, not sleep-related, and 'monologue' or 'prologue' do not fit the context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>&nbsp;Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Conceited</p>

english.explanation: The antonym of 'conceited' (meaning overly self-confident) is 'modest', which means having a low opinion of one's abilities. 'Proud' and 'vain' are synonyms, while 'superior' is context-dependent.

questions.original_question: <strong>&nbsp;Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Proffesser' is misspelled; the correct spelling is 'Professor'. The other words are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>Suresh has only been working <u>here since one month</u> and he has already learnt the job.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The preposition 'for' is used with a duration (e.g., 'for one month'), not 'since'. 'Since' refers to a specific point in time (e.g., 'since March'), making option 4 the correct substitution.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Reciept' is misspelled; the correct spelling is 'Receipt'. The other options are spelled correctly.
The logical sequence is: Mala orders items (B), the shopkeeper responds (A), Mala asks the price (D), and the shopkeeper mentions the discount (C). This order (BADC) ensures coherence.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Himank&#39;s health has ______ ever since he has refused to get himself treated.</p>

english.explanation: 'Deteriorated' means to become worse, fitting the context of declining health. 'Depreciated' and 'denigrated' refer to value or reputation, while 'disparaged' means to belittle.
The correct order is: Tenali and his wife travel (D), stop at a village (A), observe the weightlifter (C), and Tenali reacts (B). This sequence (DACB) follows a logical narrative flow.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>BRAT</p>

english.explanation: 'Brat' refers to a spoiled or mischievous child. Options 2–4 are unrelated to the meaning of the word.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Use your logical thinking for ______ decisions today as you will certainly succeed.</p>

english.explanation: 'Critical' fits the context of making thoughtful decisions. 'Severe', 'dangerous', and 'desperate' do not align with the sentence's emphasis on logic and success.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>No sooner did Priya / get her report card / when she started jumping / with joy.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'No sooner...than' is required for correct structure. 'When she started jumping' breaks this rule, making it the error. The other parts are grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>&nbsp;Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Comfort</p>

english.explanation: 'Discontentment' is the opposite of 'comfort', which means ease or reassurance. 'Happiness' and 'enjoyment' are synonyms, while 'luxury' is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Deride</p>

english.explanation: 'Deride' means to mock or ridicule. 'Lift', 'admire', and 'approve' are antonyms or unrelated in meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the following idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Lion&#39;s share</p>

options.value: The strongest and richest partner in a group
The part that must be left for the guests in a party
The greatest and most desirable portion of something
The sound produced by a lion when it is attacking a prey

english.correct_answer: 3. The greatest and most desirable portion of something
english.explanation: The idiom 'lion’s share' refers to the largest or most valuable portion of something. Option 3 directly matches this meaning. The other options are unrelated: option 1 describes a powerful partner, option 2 refers to hospitality, and option 4 is a literal description of a lion’s sound.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>Four of earliest civilisations / of the world / were located / on the banks of or near large rivers.</p>

options.value: <span style="color: rgb(33, 37, 41);">on the banks of&nbsp;</span>or near large rivers

english.explanation: The phrase 'Four of earliest civilisations' is grammatically incorrect because it lacks the article 'the' after 'of'. The correct phrase should be 'Four of the earliest civilisations'. The other parts of the sentence are grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A&nbsp;person&nbsp;who&nbsp;thinks&nbsp;that&nbsp;bad&nbsp;things are more&nbsp;likely&nbsp;to&nbsp;happen&nbsp;or who&nbsp;emphasises&nbsp;the&nbsp;bad&nbsp;part&nbsp;of a&nbsp;situation</p>

english.explanation: A pessimist is someone who expects bad outcomes or focuses on negative aspects, matching the definition given. 'Optimist' (option 2) is the opposite. 'Complainer' (option 1) is too general, and 'Misanthropist' (option 3) refers to someone who hates humanity.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>&nbsp;Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>The boy&#39;s cricket ball broke the neighbour&#39;s window.</p>

options.value: The neighbour&#39;s window was broken by the boy&#39;s cricket ball.
The neighbour&#39;s window had been broke by the boy&#39;s cricket ball.
The neighbour&#39;s window was broke by the boy&#39;s cricket ball
The neighbour&#39;s window is broken by the boy&#39;s cricket ball

english.correct_answer: 1. The neighbour’s window was broken by the boy’s cricket ball.
english.explanation: The passive voice requires the past participle 'broken' and the correct auxiliary verb 'was'. Options 2 and 3 use incorrect verb forms (had been broke/was broke). Option 4 uses the present tense, which does not match the original past-tense sentence.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the following idiom.</strong></p>

<p>A live wire</p>

english.correct_answer: 2. A very active or energetic person
english.explanation: The idiom 'a live wire' describes someone who is highly energetic or lively. Option 2 matches this. Option 1 refers to danger, option 3 to power, and option 4 to temperament, none of which align with the idiom’s meaning.
